title: The Dave Dameshek Football Program - Episode 1, May 5, 2011
itunes:title: The Dave Dameshek Football Program - Episode 1, May 5, 2011
description:
Dave Dameshek gets his show off the ground with his pals as he basks in the glow of the recently-finished NFL draft. He's got some interesting thoughts about Steelers RB Rashard Mendenhall's tweeting ability as well as the newest No. 1 draft pick, Cam Newton. Dave also lays out his first rule of fan conduct: the Jim Ir-Say It Isn't So Rule.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
